dimension: 25 1/2 x 20 x 3 5/8 in. (64.77 x 50.8 x 9.21 cm) (without flaps or center tabs)
title: Pad Saddle
description: padded saddle cover with ovoid beaded medallion in each corner-white ground with leaves and flowers, trimmed in red fabric; red wool stitching around edges; four decorative flaps at corners-white beaded ground with multicolored beaded flowers and leaves; flaps have red wool tassels with grey, brown and clear beads on fringe
creditline: Gift of the estate of Harry Otto and Lydia Leonhard Frank
